Articles.Content:
honestly, when I first saw this I didn't really know what to expect, but when you see it you will fall of your seat laughing.

if you don't see the thing at first, make sure to read what it says on the chalk board. if you still don't see what I'm talking about, then you need to go and get this game straight away. What amazes me is how stupid those reporters must be not to see through such a blatant Hoax.

I don't really understand this?

Some Portal-playing hoaxers?

what don't you understand? if you were a bit more specific I could explain it to you, but all I can really say is that there honestly isn't much else it could be since I don't believe in the paranormal and considering its the exact same saying as the one from portal that has sneaked in to popular media, it definitely seems to be a hoax to me.
